directions: Spoon rice, beans and salsa into bowl. Sprinkle with cheese. Top with avocado slices. Garnish with lime, cilantro and hot sauce, if desired.
ingredients: 3/4 cup cooked truRoots® Organic Germinated Brown Rice
3/4 cup black beans, rinsed and drained
Lime wedge, cilantro sprigs and hot sauce for garnish (optional)
title: Brown Rice Bean Burrito Bowl
